text: Ðis synd þa landgemæra to mylebroce ærest of <hreod> <bricge> on tærstan stream.
Andlang streames on hnut scyllinga mearce.
And swa andlang mearce on þone holan weg.
Of þan holan wege andlang mearce on fearninga broc.
And swa andlang mearce on mylebroces ford.
And swa east andlang <mearce> on þunres lea norðeweardne.
Þanan andlang weges on cynges dic.
And swa andlang mearce on þone oðerne holan weg.
Of þam wege on ða ea & se werstede be suðan hreod bricge ut þurh þone stream on þæs cynges stæð.
And swa andlang streames eft on hreod bricge and se haga on hamtune þe þærto gebyrað.
Ðis is þæra VII hyda landboc to mylebroce þe Eadweard cing gebocade Ælfwine bisceope on ece yrfe.
